header.editProfileDesc: Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.

landing.heroSubtitle: Get personalized crop recommendations and yield estimates based on your soil conditions.
landing.predictionDesc: Advanced ML models to predict the best crop for your soil.
landing.weatherDesc: Real-time weather data analysis for accurate recommendations.
landing.yieldDesc: Get expected yield calculations based on historical data.
landing.howItWorksDesc: Our AI system analyzes multiple factors to provide you with the most accurate crop recommendations
landing.supportedCropsDesc: Get recommendations for a wide variety of crops suited to your region and soil conditions
landing.moreCrops: And many more crops including Cotton, Pulses, Sugarcane, and more!
landing.whyChooseDesc: Our platform combines advanced AI algorithms with local agricultural data to provide precise recommendations.
landing.benefit1: Maximize crop yield with data-driven decisions
landing.benefit2: Reduce farming risks through accurate predictions
landing.benefit3: Save time with instant AI recommendations
landing.benefit6: Get confidence scores for each recommendation
landing.readyToOptimizeDesc: Join thousands of farmers using AI to make better decisions.
landing.analyticsDesc: Make data-driven decisions with our comprehensive analytics. Visualize historical rainfall patterns and estimate crop profitability to maximize your yields.
landing.smartFarmingImgDesc: Making agriculture more efficient and sustainable

auth.joinMessage: Join CropAI to access smart farming tools
auth.signInMessage: Sign in to access AI-powered crop estimates
auth.termsMessage: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

footer.copyright: © 2026 AI Crop System. Empowering farmers with technology.

estimate.title: Standard Estimate
estimate.description: Estimate based on location and season without soil test data
estimate.waterDesc: Low: Scant/Drought, Medium: Normal, High: Abundant/Irrigated

results.processing: Processing your data with AI algorithms
results.analyzingMessage: Analyzing soil nutrients and weather conditions...
results.predictionDesc: Your crop recommendation will appear here
results.noPredictionDesc: Fill in the input form and click 'Get Standard Estimate' to get AI-powered recommendations
results.predictionSuccessDesc: AI-powered crop recommendation based on your inputs
results.basedOnData: Based on your soil and climate data
results.tipMessage: This recommendation is based on your soil composition and local climate data. Consider consulting with local agricultural experts for best results.

chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I am your AI farming assistant. How can I help you today?

responses.greeting: Hello there! Feel free to ask me about crop recommendations or weather.
responses.crop: To get a crop recommendation, please go to the 'Estimate' page and fill in your soil details.
responses.weather: I use real-time weather data to help provide accurate crop suggestions.
responses.default: I'm still learning! Please try asking about crops, weather, or farming tips.

analytics.title: Market & Climate Analytics
analytics.description: Analyze historical rainfall patterns and crop profitability estimates.
analytics.noData: No data available for this state

inputForm.title: Soil Test Estimate
inputForm.description: Enter soil nutrients, pH level, and location details for accurate crop prediction
inputForm.nitrogenDesc: Essential for leaf growth and green color
inputForm.phosphorusDesc: Important for root development and flowering
inputForm.potassiumDesc: Enhances disease resistance and water regulation
inputForm.phDesc: Neutral pH (6.5-7.5) is ideal for most crops
inputForm.stateDesc: Select the state where farming will be done
inputForm.cityDesc: Enter your city or district name
